short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to bookmark timestamps in YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Video Bookmark Manager

Overview:

YouTube Video Bookmark Manager is a powerful, simple and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help you bookmark important timestamps in YouTube videos. With this extension, you can easily mark, view, edit, and manage your video bookmarks directly from the YouTube player interface. Whether you're a student, researcher, or just a YouTube enthusiast, this tool will enhance your video-watching experience by allowing you to jump to key moments effortlessly.

Features:

Bookmark Timestamps:

Easily bookmark any timestamp while watching a YouTube video with a single click.
The bookmark button is conveniently placed at the bottom right corner of the video player.

View Bookmarks:

Access all your bookmarks for the current video in a neatly organized list.
Each bookmark displays the timestamp and a customizable title.

Navigate to Bookmarks:

Click on any bookmark in the list to instantly jump to the saved timestamp in the video.

Edit Bookmarks:

Edit the title of any bookmark to better describe the content of that timestamp.
Enter edit mode with an "Edit" button, change the title, and save or cancel your changes.

Delete Bookmarks:

Remove bookmarks that are no longer needed with a simple click of the delete button.

Saved Videos Tab:

Access a list of all videos with saved bookmarks.
Click on a video in the list to load and view its bookmarks.

User-Friendly Interface:

Intuitive and clean user interface for managing bookmarks.
Styled buttons for "Edit," "OK," "Cancel," and "Delete" actions, ensuring a seamless user experience.

Persistent Storage:

Bookmarks are saved using Chrome's local storage, ensuring they persist across sessions.

How to Use:

Installing the Extension:

Install the YouTube Bookmark Manager from the Chrome Web Store or by loading the unpacked extension in developer mode.

Bookmarking Timestamps:

While watching a YouTube video, click the bookmark button at the bottom right corner of the video player to save the current timestamp.

Managing Bookmarks:

Open the extension popup to view all bookmarks for the current video.
Edit or delete bookmarks as needed.
Navigate to any bookmark by clicking on it in the list.

Saved Videos:

Switch to the "Saved Videos" tab in the extension popup to see all videos with bookmarks.
Click on a video to load and view its bookmarks.

Conclusion:
YouTube Video Bookmark Manager is your go-to tool for efficiently managing and navigating through important moments in YouTube videos. Enhance your productivity and enjoy a more organized video-watching experience with this versatile extension.
